QuestData.Title: Porcupine Soul
QuestData.Description: <The Porcupine Soul is cautious and shy. The shape of the porcupine will be yours to call upon.>
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Porcupine Soul to Choofa in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Bring the Porcupine Soul to Choofa in the Heart of the Forest.
QuestData.RewardText: Ooh, a porcupine! Some say they're prickly, but I think they're nice.
